channel.title: Can't acces my smf forum without www
channel.description:
Hey, I recently discovered i can't acces my forums without www.
So if i try to go to the website like this
Mywebsite.com i get this error
[img]http://gyazo.com/779246e57324379cf1576b634edda431.png?1359931107[/img]
but if i just do this www.Mywebsite.com im able to go on my smf forums.

item.title: Can't acces my smf forum without www
item.dc:creator: @iCreatedHorror Ryan
item.description:
@iCreatedHorror wrote:

Could be something within the .htaccess file.

Read full topic
item.source: Can't acces my smf forum without www

item.title: Can't acces my smf forum without www
item.dc:creator: @Lastdivine Lastdivine
item.description:
@Lastdivine wrote:

The Web Guy:

This is due to redirecting issues, are you presented with a control panel for your web host/domain routing’s? Also, sometimes if you’ve just recently purchased a web host and domain, it may take up to 24 hours for it to route the www. correctly.

I’ve got this domain for 6/7 Months not had any trouble with it.

But this is the first time i made smf as main website.
I contacted my webhost they told me the DNS was right and it should be a problem with SMF

Read full topic
item.source: Can't acces my smf forum without www
